article.title: System of Systems Analytics Wins Biometric Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: System of Systems Analytics Incorporated, Fairfax, Virginia, was awarded a $21,031,950 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the services in support of developing and operationalizing capabilities for collecting, managing, and employing biometric data. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Adelphi, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
